GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Update Blank Addresses on HH Members
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Update Blank Addresses on HH Members. Use HH address record to pull data for update.
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Update Blank Addresses on HH Members
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_UPDATEBLANKADDR_HHMEMBERS ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
DECLARE @ADDEDBYID varchar(50) SET @ADDEDBYID = @changeagentid
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @CONSTITUENTSELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1 declare @I_MAX int = 1
insert into @T select ID from constituent where id in (select id from @CONSTITUENTSELECTION)
declare @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier declare @PC uniqueidentifier declare @RM uniqueidentifier declare @ADDRESSCOUNT integer
set @ADDRESSCOUNT = 0 select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENTID from @T where PK = @I -- begin try set @ADDRESSCOUNT = 0 select @ADDRESSCOUNT = count(*) from ADDRESS where constituentid = @CONSTITUENTID if @ADDRESSCOUNT = 0 begin insert into address (constituentid,addresstypecodeid,isprimary,donotmail,startdate,enddate,countryid,stateid,addressblock,city,postcode,cart,dpc,lot,sequence,addedbyid,changedbyid,dateadded,datechanged, donotmailreasoncodeid,isconfidential) select @CONSTITUENTID,addresstypecodeid,isprimary,donotmail,startdate,enddate,countryid,stateid,addressblock,city,postcode,cart,dpc,lot,sequence,@CHANGEAGENTID,@CHANGEAGENTID,getdate(),getdate(), donotmailreasoncodeid,isconfidential from address where constituentid = (select top 1 groupid from groupmember where memberid=@CONSTITUENTID) and isprimary = 1 --constituentid of member w/o address
set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + @@ROWCOUNT end end try begin catch --exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; --return 1; --do nothing. Only process those that it can. Skip others. end catch
set @I = @I + 1 -- end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
